attributes.action: Allow undiagnosed children the right to remain on a ventilator until diagnosed!!
attributes.additional_details:
EVERY child & EVERY parent should always have the legal right and last say when seeking a second opinion from a different hospital, whether it be oversea's or an additional hospital here in the UK. 
No-one should have the right to take parental right's away from parent's when deciding this and exploring different avenues in order to finding a diagnosis for there child(ren). 
Not the goverment nor the hospital, it is injustice. 
No-one know's a child more, more then the parent's themselve's!!!
attributes.background:
I speak on before of the children, parent's and our nation!

Undiagnosed Children should be cared for with dignity, compassion and have the legal right to remain on a ventilator until given a diagnosis by a hospital of there parent's choice. Not euthanized, it is beyond incomprehensible!

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.  We're not sure what you mean by "Allow undiagnosed children the right to remain on a ventilator until diagnosed!!". 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
